title: The Color of Cities Atom theme
creator: DLTO

extendedInfo.description: Everybody around the world dreams going to that place. We introduce beautiful places like watercolor.[ TÄj Mahal ] The Taj Mahal in india that was built for remember the beloved wife.[ St. Basilâs Cathedral ] This is considered the characteristic structure with Russian values. St. Basilâs Cathedral that boasts beautiful color and pattern.[ å¤§éªå ] The osaka castle is in harmony with gold decoration and cherry blossoms.[ Big Ben ] The big ben that tolling the bells of the new year for British.[ Sultan Ahmed Mosque ] Sultan Ahmed Mosque that was more famous for âBlue Mosqueâ because of the decoration tile colored blue and green.***Main Features:- Exclusive Widgets: Clock, Memo Calendar, Contact, Settings and Search Bar- Gestures: Pinch, Double Touch, Slide, Long-Touch- Smart Folder: Ability to add folders on ALL apps and the âHomeâ screen, flexible sizing- Dock Bar: Access up to 20 of your favorite apps instantly, includes an âEmotionalâ Filter Effect, Screen settings, and opacity adjustments.- Multi-Wallpaper: Automatically switch between 3-24 different wallpapers when the display is turned on/off- Deep Customization: âPoint Colorsâ are completely adjustable and modify the look and feel of Widgets, Menu, Guides, or Icons.- Live Background: Brings your background into the 21st century â beautiful dynamic backgrounds- Wide-Ranging Theme Support: Supports existing SSKIN and GO launching themes***Main Points:- High Quality: Optimized for Ice Cream Sandwich / Jellybean (Android ICS/JB 4.0.2 onwards)- Light & Easy: Options instantly selectable through a light and easy launcher interface- Stylish: Stylish UI with beautiful backgrounds, icons, and custom color schemes from professional designers- Smart: Themes are optimized automatically for ICS and existing launchers such as SSKIN and GO are completely supported - Fun: Offers fun, interactive themes with live, beautiful backgrounds and widgets***ATTENTION- Available from Android OS version 4.0.2 and above- Requires 10 MB space to save theme resources- To enhance usability, installed theme doesnât appear- Not available for Tab Devices (Extra-Large Screen)- Badges: Display missed call, unread messages (ATOM only supports default apps on your Android device, does not support device-specific functions)- Due to resolution issues, service is currently stopped on âOptimus Viewâ*** Customer SupportPlease leave reviews or comments. Your review is appreciated and we read every one.For more information or support, please visit - Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/#!/Atom.Home

reviews.title: The best so far
reviews.comment: This is a very nice theme. I love it so much, every time I unlock my phone I see a new background and all are nice, may be you can add more wonders of world. Please add more icons too
reviews.author: Manoj Kumar

reviews.title: Love this one
reviews.comment: Love the cool, watercolor feel. Each time I unlock screen it\'s a different city. It would be five stars if there were more icons...the icons are really cool and I wish I could utilize them for more of my homescreen apps.
reviews.author: Cynthia Guertin

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: This is the most beautiful theme I have ever come across. Please make more wallpapers for this theme!
reviews.author: Erh-Li Tang

reviews.title: Beauty
reviews.comment: This is the best theme I\'ve seen. Please make efforts to make more like these. Awesome.
reviews.author: Khurram Nawaz
